channel.title: Thoughts on Y.Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Y.Wu

item.title: Sentiment Analysis Projects
item.description: Contemporary sentiment analysis has been applied to online customer reviews (Amazon kind of basis). Robust computational algorithm has been applied to online flight ticket sales. The idea of this project is to use the same knowledge developed by computer scientists Liu in 2014 to grab studentsâ€™ reviews for their taken online courses. However, it can be challenging in the following aspects: Online forum data privacy regarding the students and the institutions.

item.title: Make Neighborhood Green Again
item.description: West Lawrence Greening Project This is a story map made through https://storymaps.arcgis.com/en/. The story map demonstrates the lack of walkability and canopy in West Lawrence neighborhoods. More details can be found at https://www.arcgis.com/apps/Cascade/index.html?appid=21536c10fe15412aa449045c9c6b0444.
